[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@secured-finance/stablecoin-lib-ethers](./stablecoin-lib-ethers.md) &gt; [EthersSfStablecoin](./stablecoin-lib-ethers.etherssfstablecoin.md)

## EthersSfStablecoin class

Convenience class that combines multiple interfaces of the library in one object.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class EthersSfStablecoin implements ReadableEthers, TransactableProtocol 
```
**Implements:** [ReadableEthers](./stablecoin-lib-ethers.readableethers.md)<!-- -->, [TransactableProtocol](./stablecoin-lib-base.transactableprotocol.md)

## Remarks

The constructor for this class is marked as internal. Third-party code should not call the constructor directly or create subclasses that extend the `EthersSfStablecoin` class.
